# __card__

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of __card__ is to create functions and analytical approaches in neurocardiology, with a focus on electrocardiogram data and epidemiological concepts. An important engine within this ecosystem are the circadian analysis tools.

## Installation

Once published, you can install the released version of autonomicR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r}
#install.packages("__card__")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("asshah4/card")
```
